trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in list or tabular form.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som basisklasse for alle ASP.NET-versjon 2.0 databundet kontrollene som viser dataene sine i listen eller tabellformat.

trans-unit.source: The DataBoundControl class is the base class used for ASP.NET controls that retrieve tabular or list-style data from an ASP.NET data source control and bind user-interface (UI) elements of the control to that data for display.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataBoundControl er basisklasse brukes for ASP.NET-kontroller som henter tabular eller listestilen data fra en ASP.NET-data kilde kontroll og binde elementer i brukergrensesnittet (UI) kontrollens til dataene for visning.

trans-unit.source: Composite data-bound controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>; list-style data-bound controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>; and other controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> derive from DataBoundControl.
trans-unit.target: Sammensatt databundet kontroller for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>; listestilen databundet kontroller som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>; og andre kontroller som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>avledes fra DataBoundControl.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Page developers do not use the DataBoundControl class directly; instead, they use controls that derive from this class.
trans-unit.target: Siden utviklere bruker ikke klassen DataBoundControl direkte. i stedet bruke de kontrollene som er avledet fra denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: Control developers extend this class to create data-bound controls that work with classes that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface and classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> classes.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere utvide denne klassen for å opprette databundet Kontroller samarbeider med klasser som implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>grensesnittet og klasser som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>klasser.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When deriving a class from the DataBoundControl class, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method to bind the UI elements of your control to data retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når det avledes en klasse fra klassen DataBoundControl, eller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>metode til å binde UI-elementene for kontrollen til data som hentes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is the only method you will override in your derived class.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>metoden er den eneste du vil overstyre i den utledede klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: For ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method is the equivalent of the `DataBind` method, and is called to bind data at run time.
trans-unit.target: For ASP.NET 2.0 databundet Kontroller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>metoden tilsvarer den `DataBind` metoden, og for å binde data på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>metodekall den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref> class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"> </xref> klasse for bruk av en arvet klasse-forekomst.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren, kan bare kalles med en arvet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when data methods are being called.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når datametoder blir kalt.

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to specify that the data methods to be called are on a different object than the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: Formålet med denne hendelsen er å gi deg muligheten til å angi at datametoder for å kalles er på et annet objekt enn den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a default <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object used by the data-bound control if no arguments are specified.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en standard <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objekt som brukes av databundet kontrollen hvis noen argumenter er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataSourceSelectArguments method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectArguments%2A> property to initialize a default arguments object, and by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDataSourceSelectArguments brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectArguments%2A>til å initialisere en standard argumenter-objekt, og ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>klassens implementering av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectArguments%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> initialized to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> initialisert til <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> object is being created.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"> </xref> objekt opprettes.

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> instance in scenarios where you want to use a custom class that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> class.
trans-unit.target: Formålet med denne hendelsen er å gi deg muligheten til å endre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>forekomst i tilfeller der du vil bruke en egendefinert klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the list of data that the data-bound control binds to, in cases where the data source contains more than one distinct list of data items.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på listen som databundet kontrollen bindes til i tilfeller der datakilden inneholder flere distinkte elementliste data.

trans-unit.source: The value of the DataMember property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for DataMember egenskapen er lagret i visningen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The name of the specific list of data that the data-bound control binds to, if more than one list is supplied by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på en spesifikk liste som databundet kontrollen bindes til, hvis mer enn én liste er angitt av en datakilde-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir IDen for kontroll hvor databundet kontrollen henter fra listen over dataelementer.

trans-unit.source: The ID of a control that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
trans-unit.target: IDen for en kontroll som representerer datakilden som databundet kontrollen henter dataene.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref> interface, which provides access to the object's data content.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som implementerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"> </xref> grensesnittet som gir tilgang til objektets datainnhold.

trans-unit.source: An object with access to its data content.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt med tilgang til innholdet data.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object that the data-bound control uses to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekt som databundet kontrollen bruker til å utføre dataoperasjoner.

trans-unit.source: The GetData method retrieves a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object from the associated data source control by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: GetData-metoden henter en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objektet fra de tilknyttede dataene kontrollen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property is used to identify a data source, a default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>egenskapen brukes til å identifisere en datakilde, standard <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objekt er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> that the data-bound control uses to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> som databundet kontrollen bruker til å utføre dataoperasjoner.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember*> property is set, a specific, named <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> is returned; otherwise, the default <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember*>egenskapen er angitt, en bestemt navnet <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> er returnerte; ellers, standard <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref> interface that the data-bound control is associated with, if any.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"> </xref> grensesnittet databundet kontrollen er knyttet til, hvis noen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method calls the GetDataSource method internally.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>metodekall metoden getdatasource som er internt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.GetData%2A>

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> instance is retrieved by these two methods and is cached by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> object until the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method signals that the data source has changed.
trans-unit.target: En gyldig <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>forekomsten er hentet av disse metodene og er bufret av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>objekt før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>metoden signaliserer at datakilden er endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref> that represents the data source identified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"> </xref> som representerer datakilden som er identifisert av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether model binding is in use.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om modellen bindingen er i bruk.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if model binding is in use; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis modellen bindingen er i bruk. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data item type for strongly typed data binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på elementet datatypen for forespørselsparameter av sterk type databinding.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property enables the `Item` and `BindItem` data-binding expressions.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen for denne egenskapen kan den `Item` og `BindItem` databinding uttrykk.

trans-unit.source: Setting this method automatically enables Dynamic Data functionality.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen denne metoden automatisk aktiverer dynamisk Data.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: The name of the model type.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på modelltypen.

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter visningsstatus informasjon fra en tidligere sideforespørsel som er lagret av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SaveViewState*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the view state to restore.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer visningsstatusen til å gjenopprette.

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of the control in view state as successfully bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Angir tilstanden for kontrollen i visningen tilstand som er bundet til data.

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control maintains a value in view state that indicates whether it is currently bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Databundet kontrollen opprettholder en verdi i visningsstatusen som angir om den for øyeblikket er bundet til data.

trans-unit.source: The MarkAsDataBound method sets the value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden MarkAsDataBound angir verdien til `true`.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreatingModelDataSource"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreatingModelDataSource"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> object that is being created.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som gir tilgang til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"> </xref> objekt som opprettes.

trans-unit.source: Rebinds the data-bound control to its data after one of the base data source identification properties changes.
trans-unit.target: Rebinds databundet kontrollen til dataene etter en base dataene datakilden identifikasjon egenskaper endres.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceViewChanged method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and any necessary work should be performed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceViewChanged varsler en databundet kontroll som den underliggende datakilden er endret, og at kontrollen skal binde og nødvendig arbeid skal utføres.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the OnDataSourceViewChanged method is called when a property of the data source view has changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceViewChanged kalles når en egenskap for datakildevisningen er endret.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` when it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>klasse angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>egenskapen `true` når den opphøyer den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceViewChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceViewChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event, the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen, den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Behandler den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to set the initialized state of the data-bound control and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` if the HTTP request is not a postback.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>klasse kall av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å definere initialisert databundet kontrollen og angir de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>egenskapen `true` Hvis HTTP-forespørselen ikke er en tilbakesending.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.ConfirmInitState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.
trans-unit.target: Angir initialisert kontrollens databundet før kontrollen lastes.

trans-unit.source: The OnPagePreLoad method is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPagePreLoad overstyres av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>klassen for å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true` i tilfeller der HTTP-forespørselen er en tilbakesending og visningsstatusen er aktivert, men kontrollen databundet ennå ikke er bundet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: This scenario is common with controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>, where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: Dette scenarioet som er felles med kontroller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>, der synligheten for kontrollen er endret på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref> som hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, binding data fra datakilden til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Implement this method instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method when you derive a data-bound control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Implementer denne metoden i stedet for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>metoden når du avledet en databundet kontroll fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Placing your control's data-binding logic in PerformDataBinding enables you to avoid the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound> events being raised in the wrong order.
trans-unit.target: Å sette inn kontrollen databinding logic i PerformDataBinding gjør at du kan unngå den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>hendelser blir opphøyd i feil rekkefølge.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>

trans-unit.source: While the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class provides no specific implementation for this method, the PerformDataBinding method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method to bind the values of any user interface (UI) controls to the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Da grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>klassen gir ingen bestemt implementering for denne metoden, metoden PerformDataBinding kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>metode til å binde verdiene i en brukergrensesnittet (UI) kontrollerer for dataene som er hentet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> list of data returned from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect*> method call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>liste over dataene som ble returnert fra en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect*>metodekallet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the associated data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter data fra den tilknyttede datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is called after data is retrieved to bind data to elements of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>metoden etter data som hentes for å binde data til elementer kontrollens databundet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived types override this method to retrieve data only if the default implementation is not adequate.
trans-unit.target: Avledede typer overstyre denne metoden for å hente data om standard implementering ikke er tilstrekkelig.

trans-unit.source: Typically, it is sufficient to provide a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback> delegate that performs any custom data work, rather than implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Det er vanligvis tilstrekkelig til å angi en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback>representanten som utfører arbeid tilpassede data, i stedet for å implementere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback>

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer endringer visningsstatus som har forekommet siden siden ble posteres tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollens gjeldende visningsstatus.

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen visningsstatusen som er knyttet til kontrollen metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object that the data-bound control uses when retrieving data from a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objekt som bruker databundet kontrollen under henting av data fra en kontroll av data.

trans-unit.source: The SelectArguments property calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method to create a default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object.
trans-unit.target: SelectArguments egenskapen kall av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>metode for å opprette en standard <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> value used by the data-bound control to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> verdien som brukes av kontrollen databundet til å hente data.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to call in order to read data.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden for å kalle for å kunne lese data.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen fører til at modellen binding som skal brukes som metoden databinding.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden.

trans-unit.source: Causes view-state changes to the control to be tracked so they can be stored in the control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fører til visningsstatus endringer i kontrollen skal spores slik at de kan lagres i kontrollens <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.
trans-unit.target: Bekrefter at objektet en databundet kontroll binding til en de fungerer med.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateDataSource method is only called in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class's mutator (`set` accessor) for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ValidateDataSource bare kalles den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>klassens mutator (`set` aksessor) for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class checks the type of the object that is set for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property to ensure that it is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>klassen kontrollerer typen for objektet som er angitt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>til å sikre at den er en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, eller <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: An object set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er satt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The object passed by the dataSource parameter is not or a recognized type.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som ble sendt den dataSource -parameteren er ikke eller gjenkjennes.
